detail_desc: All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front and a jersey-lined, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy weave with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist with tasselled ties at the sides, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front and ties at the hem.
Thin metal chain necklaces, one with a pendant. Adjustable length, 53-61 cm and 63-75 cm.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Block-patterned T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves, a seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.

Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap. Fine-knit slipover with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and roomy legs. Button fly and raw-edge hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft modal and cotton jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Mittens in a soft knit containing glittery threads with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs and a decorative bow.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with lapped shoulders and shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with 3/4-length raglan sleeves with an opening and ties. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt in a double layer of chiffon. Partly lined in jersey.
Jacket in crispy nylon with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and block-coloured raglan sleeves. Zipped front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with terry appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sequined motif on the front.
Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave with a high waist, small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
Short dress in a softly draping weave with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shimmering metallic imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and elasticated hem. Seamless. Light support.

Set with a hat and mittens in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing. Both hat and mittens have a fleece lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist with a jacquard-weave elastic waistband.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a round pendant.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Shorter jacket in a jacquard weave with raw, frayed edges and no fastenings.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Suit waistcoat in soft, brushed fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, welt front pockets, an adjustable tab at the back, and small slits in the sides. Lined.
Wide blouse in a soft weave with gathered details, a stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, raglan, balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
High-waisted, calf-length, pleated skirt in jersey with a slight sheen. Laser-cut edge at the hem. Unlined.
Leggings in soft, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative seams on the legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a washed look. Jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.

Long dress in patterned chiffon. Stand-up collar with concealed buttons at the back, an opening at the back and a concealed zip with a hook-and-eye fastener. Long, wide sleeves with pleats at the shoulders, a gathered seam that creates volume and movement and a seam above the tapered cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a high slit at the front. Shorter, V-neck underdress in a viscose weave that can be unbuttoned to remove.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Jersey fancy dress costume with an accessory, a print motif on the front and a hook and loop fastening at the back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a smocked stand-up collar with a small frill trim, and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and narrow ties under the bust. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a soft knit with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Scalloped edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt dress in a modal weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather with a narrow, braided shoulder strap, a zip at the top and rows of fringing. Lined, Size 15x18 cm.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the back, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.

Short dress in an airy jacquard weave with a round neckline and opening at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication, a gathered seam at the waist, and a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey underdress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length shorts in soft, stretch viscose and linen twill. High waist with pleats, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap and button, and wide, straight-cut legs with raw-edge, cut-off hems.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Metal earrings with faceted sparkly stones and square pendants. Length approx. 4.8 cm.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit. Round neck with a metal press-stud, decorative metal buttons on one shoulder and long raglan sleeves.
Leggings in soft, superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs.
Flared, calf-length skirt in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined with a short skirt.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Soft, fine-knit jumper in a slightly looser fit with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, down the front and at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Blouse in cotton poplin with a collar, concealed buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide, flared flounce and button at the cuffs. Yoke with pleats at the back and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
